Posts.EditableText: Is there really a quest engine 6? I went looking for it and there was a download button that took me to an inactive page.
Posts.HTML: Is there really a quest engine 6? I went looking for it and there was a download button that took me to an inactive page.

Posts.EditableText: The Pixie has been working on a rewrite of Quest, which is sometimes referred to as Quest 6 and sometimes QuestJS. You can find it here: <https://github.com/ThePix/QuestJS>
Posts.HTML: The Pixie has been working on a rewrite of Quest, which is sometimes referred to as Quest 6 and sometimes QuestJS. You can find it here: https://github.com/ThePix/QuestJS
